highlights.description: This highlight showcases an intense moment from the LCS Spring Split 2024. Impact on Ornn demonstrates exceptional skill and game sense, making a crucial play that could turn the tide of the match between FPX and iG.
highlights.commentary: … IG's JackeyLove pressures the top lane alone and takes down FPX’s outer turret, marking a BUILDINGKILL event in the TOPLANE--a small but crucial step toward regaining map control despite IG trailing 5-12 in kills and over 3k gold.

highlights.description: This highlight showcases an intense moment from the LEC Winter Split 2024. Caps on LeBlanc demonstrates exceptional skill and game sense, making a crucial play that could turn the tide of the match between G2 Esports and Fnatic.
highlights.commentary: Caps shows why he's considered one of the best mid laners in the world with this incredible LeBlanc outplay. After baiting out Fnatic's key cooldowns, he executes a perfect chain of distortions and mimics, securing a crucial pick on the enemy jungler.
